sentences: Rob Kirwan  is record producer, mixing engineer and audio engineer based in Dublin, Ireland.
Born 14 January 1970 in DÃºn Laoghaire, Dublin, Ireland, Kirwan was educated at St. Columba's College, Dublin.
Kirwan worked as an Assistant Engineer at Windmill Lane Recording Studios from 1992-1995.

Within his first year he worked on the U2 album Zooropa and then went on to work with renowned producers such as Flood, Brian Eno, Steve Lillywhite, Stephen Street, Geoff Emrick, Nellee Hooper and Don Was.
